timeline.body: Rather than logging the error, we should just rethrow it to cause the test to fail (we're being called synchronously).  I'd suggest using `Assertions.fail("Unhandled error in subscriber ...", error)`.  That will give lots of context but also wind up throwing an `AssertionError` which will almost always bubble all the way up and fail the test (whereas `RuntimeException` might be caught).

timeline.body: nit: We probably don't need `SlotEvent` anymore - can just call `onSlot(nodeSlot)`.  The dedicated event was just because `EventBus` didn't provide any other context so you had to search for all usages of whatever you posted, whereas the event channel interface makes it clear where this is being used.
